ext-quicksurveys-example-internal-survey: This is the description of the example internal survey
ext-quicksurveys-example-external-survey: We need your help improving Wikipedia.
By answering this survey you will help us understand how to make Wikipedia better and more useful for you. Thank you!
Survey provided by ExampleSurveyProvider. See the privacy policy.
ext-quicksurveys-survey-privacy-policy-d: All submissions are anonymous. See the [[Project:Privacy_policy|privacy policy]].
ext-quicksurveys-survey-confirm-msg: Thanks for the feedback! We are using it to make {{SITENAME}} even better!
